name: Wicked Wizards (wizards2223)
description:
Gameplay Footage Basic Controls
  • W - Move forward 
  • A - Move left
  • S - Move backwards 
  • D - Move right
  • Space - Jump 
  • Escape (esc) - Pause the game/Bring up menu 
  • E - Ready up 
  • Tab - Toggle overview 
  • Mouse - Look around/aim attacks 
Combat Controls
  • Left mouse click - Shoot fireball/Place tower 
  • 1 - Purchase shocker (lightning) tower 
  • 2 - Purchase scorcher (fire) tower 
  • 3 - Purchase freezer (ice) tower 
  • 4 - Purchase blocker (wall)
Bug List
  • When more players are in the game, sometimes the networked gets overloaded with messages and will not allow players to ready up for the next wave.
  • Towers will play VFX when no enemies are around
  • Players will often fly around if the network gets unstable
  • Objects around the ground may stall enemies
  • Enemy attack animations may continue playing after breaking walls
  • Enemies attacking the base or wall will pile up on each other
  • Game starts in FPS but then goes to overview
